question:
You are arranged to visit a friend in Canada but an important event at home now means that you must change the dates of the visit.
Write a letter to your friend.In your letter.


Explain the important event.
Apologise for the situation.
Suggest a new arrangements.
text: How are you these days?I hope you and your family are really doing well.I am writing to discuss the Trip I had booked to visit you in Canada.Unfortunately,I have to adjust plans because of something important that has come up unexpectedly.

The reason for the change is that my brother is getting married this Summer.I had plans to come to Canada from April 2nd to April 30th.However,my brother's wedding is scheduled for April 15th.What's more ,I have  been asked to look after all the events.So,I have no choice but to attend the wedding.

I am so sorry for this situation,as I knew you have already booked time off work so that you could spend time with me.However,As I am sure you could understand the situation that I can't miss out on my brother's wedding.

What I could do is to shift the dates of my trip ,As I am also free for the whole of May.Would it be possible for you to speak to your Boss and change the dates of your Holiday?If so,I would really appreciate it.
Feel free to contact me anytime.
